summary: A disinherited 13th Century Saxon nobleman leaves Norman England with an archer friend to seek his fortune in the Far East.
cast: Tyrone Power|Orson Welles|Cécile Aubry|Jack Hawkins|Michael Rennie|Finlay Currie|Herbert Lom|Mary Clare|Robert Blake|Alfonso Bedoya|Gibb McLaughlin|James Robertson Justice|Henry Oscar|Laurence Harvey|Itto Bent Lahcen|Rufus Cruickshank|Peter Drury|Valéry Inkijinoff|Carl Jaffe|Ley On|Madame Phang|Hilary Pritchard|Peter Sellers|Torin Thatcher|Ben Williams|George Woodbridge
title: La rosa negra
